name: Reverse Abduction Simulator
description:
Oh no! You deleted all of the humans from Earth! Add them back before your boss returns from his coffee break, but be careful with what you add⁠—you could end up causing chaos.

Your boss will come to check on the planet in 2:30. That means that you have 150 seconds to repopulate the planet with as many people as possible. The only issue is... your HUMAN GENERATOR™ is buggy. Releasing a buggy human means mass destruction of the people. That's bad! How high can you get the population before time runs out? Put your best score in the comments!

F11 to fullscreen.

Download the soundtrack!

Created by 2FoamBoards and TheSunCat for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. Music by Orchid.
